          <title>
            <string language="it">I nostri divertenti amici stranieri</string>
            <string language="en">Our Funny Foreign Friends</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Unsere Lustigen Fremden Freunde</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Nos Amis Étrangers Drôles</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Nossos Amigos Extrangeiros Engraçados</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι αστείοι ξένοι φίλοι μας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Nuestros Amigos No nativos Divertidos</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="it">Testi divertenti della popolare scrittrice britannica Laurie Graham, su tedeschi, Spagnoli, Britannici... Vi riconoscerete? Fate la prova!</string>
            <string language="en">Funny texts from the well-known British writer Laurie Graham about Germans, Spanish, British... Will you recognize yourself? Just try it out!</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="it">Tedeschi</string>
            <string language="en">Germans</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="it">Spagnoli</string>
            <string language="en">Spanish</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

            <string language="en">typical national behaviour</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lustige Texte vom weithin bekannten britischen 
Verfasser Laurie Graham über Deutsche, Spanischen, Briten... 
Erkennen Sie sich? Gerechter Versuch es heraus!</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Textes drôles de l'auteur britannique bien connu
Laurie Graham au sujet des Allemands, Espagnols, les Anglais... 
Vous identifierez-vous ? Essai juste il dehors !</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Textos engraçados do escritor britânico 
well-known Laurie Graham sobre alemães, espanhóis, Ingleses... 
Você reconhecer-se-á? Tentativa justa ele para fora!</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αστεία κείμενα από το γνωστό βρετανικό συγγραφέα 
Laurie Graham για Γερμανούς, ισπανικά, Βρετανοί... Θα 
αναγνωριστείτε; Ακριβώς το δοκιμάστε έξω!</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Textos divertidos del programa de escritura 
británico bien conocido Laurie Graham sobre los alemanes, españoles,
Británicos... ¿Usted se reconocerá? ¡Intento justo él 
hacia fuera!</string>
          </description>

          <description>
            <string language="it">Gli studenti non necessitano di alcun lavoro preliminare. Possono semplicemente sedersi e cominciare a riempire gli spazi con la nazione giusta, offerta loro all'inizio. Devono solo riconoscere la nazione esatta secondo il testo dato. Quindi possono fare una lista delle pagine per la nazione successiva. Alla fine, viene loro dato il risultato</string>
            <string language="en">Students do not need any previous work. They just can sit and start filling the gaps with the suitable nation, offered to them at the beginning. They have only to recognize the right nation according to the text given. they list the pages for the next nation. At the end they are given the result.</string>
          </description>
        </educational>
